channel.title: [Delta] Bandos Forgiven
channel.description:
WELCOME!
Bandos Forgiven is a upcoming Delta 317 server. It is my 2nd server ever. I hope it will become very successful somewhere in the future.
PROGRESS: Name change to Bandos Forgiven : |||||||||| - 100% Shops : |||||||| - 89% Dungeonerring : 0% Make all skills work : ||||| - 52% Add/Remove customs : ||||||| - 78%
Devolpment Diarys:
4/19/11: Changed name completely to Bandos Forgiven.

item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“OjamaBoy, post:3, topic:391730”]Im currently putting together a video.
been busy today, so shush.[/quote]
Don’t be an idiot; I wasn’t talking about pictures/videos I was talking about the detail and content of the thread.

example:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

@lap: I didn’t mean it like that, my point was he needs to put more detail in the thread if he wants anyone to look and actually comment on it.

From the looks of it you aren’t very good and this doesn’t seem like it will go anywhere, it’s just a first impression.[/quote]
